context: PayPal faced growth challenges and leadership changes. New CEO Alex Chriss focused on innovation with Fastlane checkout and AI features while Venmo monetization improved.

competitors.name: Apple Pay
competitors.notes: Growing wallet with Tap to Pay and online checkout

competitors.name: Block (Square)
competitors.notes: Cash App and Square competing across payments

competitors.name: Stripe
competitors.notes: Leading payment infrastructure for internet businesses

competitors.name: Klarna
competitors.notes: BNPL leader expanding into broader payments

competitors.name: Zelle
competitors.notes: Bank P2P network with higher volume than Venmo
